scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && rm -rf dist/*.html && cross-env INPUT=token-browser.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=intent-app.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=icon-browser.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=verification-report.html vite build
scripts.start: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development INPUT=token-browser.html vite build --watch" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development INPUT=intent-app.html vite build --watch" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development INPUT=icon-browser.html vite build --watch" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development INPUT=verification-report.html vite build --watch" "tsx watch main.ts"
